data.description: This structure is used by the Directory Container, and is the standard directory item expected by directory publishing jobs.

fields.label: Primary Name (Required)
fields.description: Name of the directory item, this can be a persons name, tenant, retailer, restaurant etc

fields.label: Sub-Title (Optional)
fields.description: This field can be used to display a subtitle (such as a store category, staff member department or a tenant floor) within Directory list and detail views.

fields.label: Description (Optional)
fields.description: Directory Item description, this is shown in the directory items details page.

fields.label: Category (Required)
fields.description: Enter one category per line, this is used to group directory items into different categories.

fields.label: Building Id (Optional)
fields.description: Building Unique Identifier (Optional only if no POI is selected)

fields.label: MaaS Map POI Reference (Optional)
fields.description: Use this field to specify the POI this retailer is associated with. (Optional only if no Building Id is selected)

fields.label: Thumbnail Image URL (Optional)
fields.description: Use this field to add a thumbnail image to your directory item

fields.label: Directory Item Image URL (Optional)
fields.description: This element is generally rendered when viewing a directory item details.

fields.label: Directory Item Phone Number (Optional)
fields.description: The directory Item phone number is used to allow users to call to a retailer, restaurant or tenant from within the app.

fields.label: Directory Item URL (Website - Optional)
fields.description: Use this field to specify if the retailer should show a web link button, and where to navigate if it does.

fields.label: Search Keywords (Optional)
fields.description: You can add words separated by spaces that can be used while searching for directory item.

fields.label: Optional ID (Optional)
fields.description: Optional Legacy item id, when present, this value will override default logic.

data.name: Directory - Directory Item
